## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem this feature would solve.
Ex: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Implementation Notes

If you have ideas about implementation:

- [ ] Requires API changes
- [ ] Requires database migration
- [ ] Requires UI changes
- [ ] Has detailed spec in `docs/backlog/`

## Detailed Specification

<!-- If this requires detailed design, create a spec file -->

For complex features, consider creating a detailed spec in [`docs/backlog/`](../../docs/backlog/README.md):

```bash
# Create spec file
touch docs/backlog/<area>/<number>-<feature-name>.md
```

Then link it here: `See [detailed spec](docs/backlog/...)`

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request.
